creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black pullover; front and back not determined; one side has large teal silk appliqued square frame with squares of decorative red and white stitching and teal appliques scrolled triangles; tail has teal rectangle filled with geometric applique in orange, blue and teal; sleeve repeats applique motif; wide white stand-up collar has starburst embroidery and orange trim; shorter side is plain black
title: Jacket
